Name: Acapulco
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Fruity and tropical in style and laced with tequila and rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Acapulco contains 208 calories
